@@ -28,4 +28,4 @@ deploy:

+            <dependency>
+                <groupId>junit</groupId>

+                <version>4.13.2</version>
+            </dependency>
+        </dependencies>
+    </dependencyManagement>
 
     <dependencies>
         <dependency>
